img_above_text:
![Wukong Sandgate 35.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/e/e1/Wukong_Sandgate_35.jpg)
Head up the hill checking the houses. One has a Rat Soldier waiting to ambush you in the back, as well as another green Wisp inside. Higher up past where the Rat Archers were is a larger and open building with some Licorice.
img_below_text:
At the top of the hill is one last shack, where you’ll find a big chest holding a **Blood of the Iron Bull** , 1 **Small Piece of Gold** , and 4 **Tiny Piece of Gold**. Plus, if you circle around the back, you can harvest a Fragrant Jade Flower.
![Wukong Sandgate 37.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/c/c8/Wukong_Sandgate_37.jpg)

        - Following Text: "At the top of the hill is one last shack, where you’ll find a big chest holding a **Blood of the Iron Bull** , 1 **Small Piece of Gold** , and 4 **Tiny Piece of Gold**. Plus, if you circle around the back, you can harvest a Fragrant Jade Flower.
![Wukong Sandgate 37.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/c/c8/Wukong_Sandgate_37.jpg)"

        Your task:
        1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
        2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.

img_summary: The image depicts a player character approaching a dilapidated building on a hill in *Black Myth: Wukong*. The red circle highlights a notable area inside the structure, possibly indicating an item or point of interest. This scene aligns with the walkthrough's instructions to explore houses for enemies, items like Licorice, and treasures such as **Blood of the Iron Bull** and gold pieces.
